title: Prawn and tamarind curry (Chemmeen vevichathu)
description: Bring the flavours of south India to your kitchen with this mouth-watering fish curry. Flavouring it with tamarind gives it an extra kick.
ingredients: 1 seedless dried tamarind (about the size of a walnut)
20–24 medium prawns, head and shell removed, deveined
½ tsp palm sugar (optional), also known as jaggery
100ml/3½fl oz warm fish stock or water (optional)
